sn46.12:1.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn46.12:1.2: In the same way, for a mendicant good friendship is the forerunner and precursor of the arising of the seven awakening factors.
sn46.12:1.3: A mendicant with good friends can expect to develop and cultivate the seven awakening factors.
sn46.12:2.1: And how does a mendicant with good friends develop and cultivate the seven awakening factors?
sn46.12:2.2: It’s when a mendicant develops the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
sn46.12:2.3: That’s how a mendicant with good friends develops and cultivates the seven awakening factors.”
